description: This would be better if it didn't open in a terminal screen and opened in a separate all together screen aka "program"
This is an amazing as designed app... better than htop.
summary: Dude Joe Morthland is a dummy

description: Gotop is really good, but this version from the store is very outdated. I suggest you go to it's github and download the latest version.

I give it two stars because I'm tired of snaps that download to my machine to anonymous locations with no icons. Then requiring me to burn time going on an easter egg hunt on the W.W.W. Looks like it might be interesting but I have other things to do.
summary: No icon, No site to go for information
